title: CUDA Kernels: Autocorrelation & Sum Reduction
description: • Published cuda-kernels on PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/cuda-kernels/0.1.0/; GPU autocorrelation & sum reduction library, 50-100x speedup vs CPU

title: C++ Basics to CUDA Kernels
description:
My notes for learning C++ from a revision of the basics to an introduction to GPU programming using CUDA. 
 Includes exercises and projects to practice the concepts from NVIDIA's Accelerated Computing in CUDA C/C++ course.

title: SensorChat - SEELAB @ UCSD
description:
Improved numerical reasoning in quantized LLMs using chain-of-thought over time-series data 
 Developed multi-agent CoT reasoning model using DPO finetuning and novel grader with Bayesian reasoning

title: Pandera.net: Modeling & Computational Mathematics
description: • Visualized implied volatility surfaces, order flow ravines, and the US yield curve

title: Crypto Pairs Trading

title: Sweat Analysis Device
